/usr/bin/c++   -fPIC -O3 -march=native -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-strict-aliasing    CMakeFiles/InfiniTAM.dir/InfiniTAM.cpp.o  -o InfiniTAM -rdynamic Engine/libEngine.a Utils/libUtils.a -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL ITMLib/libITMLib.a Utils/libUtils.a -lpng -lz /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/lib/libuvc.so /usr/local/lib/librealsense.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/lib
